$Nick Green ran to 3B as the throw was made to 1B; Miguel Cabrera's return throw went past Brandon Inge at 3B and down the LF line; when Green got up to run towards home, pitcher Armando Galarraga was in the baseline and they collided; 3B umpire Tim Tschida ruled obstruction but the play continued; when LF Clete Thomas threw out Green at the plate, the obstruction took precedence and Green was awarded home; it was an odd play in that the advance to home was started by a misplay by Cabrera, who was not charged with an error because of the obstruction

$Josh Anderson kicked the right ankle of Kevin Youkilis as he ran past 1B; Youk was stretched to catch the throw and Anderson's left foot was inside the bag as he ran by; Youkilis left with the injury

ej,bondj001,P,herna901,Intentional HBP ej,mccll001,C,herna901,Intentional HBP (acting manager) ej,lairg001,P,herna901,Arguing other ejections and calls $Jeremy Bonderman hit Delmon Young on the side of the right knee with a fast ball and HP umpire Angel Hernandez immediately ejected Bonderman; Tigers acting manager Lloyd McClendon was also automatically ejected because of the warnings issued in the previous inning; Young was angry with Twins pitcher and teammate Jose Mijares, saying that he needed to learn how to play the game; Tiger catcher Gerald Laird argued with Hendandez and was ejected; both benches emptied but no punches were thrown as players just stood around looking at one another
